Sequence Information.Source: Synthetic construct(derived from SARS-CoV spike protein)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.18442051]HIV‐luc/SARS Pseudotyped Virus:inhibition of viral-entry in Vero E3 cells(EC50=2.15 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Comments: No comments found on DRAMP database

Literature.Title: Fusion core structure of the severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus (SARS-CoV) in search of potent SARS-CoV entry inhibitors.
Literature.Author: Chu LH, Chan SH, Tsai SN, Wang Y, Cheng CH, Wong KB, Waye MM, Ngai SM.
